Title: Bismuth
Writer: Lamar Abrams, Colin Howard, Jeff Liu, Katie Mitroff, Matt Burnett (story by), Ben Levin (story by), Rebecca Sugar (story by), Ian Jones-Quartey (story by), Kat Morris (story by), Matt Burnett (story editor), Ben Levin (story editor)
Actors: Uzo Aduba, Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle
Plot: Steven discovers something the Gems thought was lost to the past inside of Lion's mane.
